structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.history: Repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 565, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 198, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 20.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Seat tax on airport shuttle vehicles.
